review: I had a uterus removal surgery from Dr. Rashmi Naik .. before this surgery I was too nervous, I thought  I won't attend this surgery. But once I consult the doctor , she explained everything , the way how she explained it took me to surgery.. after the surgery did I scare this surgery???I was so happy because such a huge surgery become so small.. just because of her... iam Very glad to her.. *** ** **** * ******* ******* I suggest everyone to consult this doctor.. because iam sure you will get a better treatment.. once again thank you soo much Doctor we never forget you and Especially thanks to Bhavani ( x-ray department) she is also help us..

Dr. Rashmi is one of the few Doctors I have met who welcomes you with a Big smile when you enter her Clinic and makes you very comfortable. I had to undergo a surgery and was very scared and apprehensive  of the procedure. She  sat me down and explained in details and instilled a lot of confidence and prepared me mentally to undergo the Surgery. By God's grace and Dr. Rashmi's expertise and dedication to her profession, the surgery was very successful and I was discharged the next day. I should say she takes extra precautions when it comes to the patient's  health especially during this Covid- 19 times when we are fighting against an invisible enemy. When you visit her Clinic, she will give you an Apron, Gloves, Foot gloves and a bag to put in ur reports. The assistant will make sure she sanitises you thoroughly and lets you in. The Doctor also is in Full PPE Gear. I have not seen such precautions being implemented in Hospital !!!!.
reply_text: Thank you so so much Seema for the wonderful things you have mentioned about the care taken at my clinic towards the patients . Helps me to continue doing the good things and always improvise on it . üôè

review: A well known doctor for nearly 5 years now. Both my mom and I got treated by Rashmi she‚Äôs a very friendly and professional doctor who explains problem in detail and treats very wisely. My issue was with PCOS was getting treated in abroad but didn‚Äôt get anymore started treatment from past 6 months and my issue has got lot better and I‚Äôm very happy with my health. All thanks to Rashmi doctor. I highly recommend this doctor to everyone.

Dr.Rashmi is very experienced and good doctor who analysed the problem in depth and suggestions provided are optimal. She treats her patients very close as a friend whom you rely on. I recommend her for the ladies who are shy to disclose their problems with her as she is friendly in nature and help them to resolve asap.Thanks Dr.Rashmi for your kind gesture and treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback . Means a lot to me .üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ****** ** **** ******** *** ************* ******* In first visit she understands your problem in detail *** ******* *** **** ********* *** ***.  She took time to review our case individually and made sure we understood our options and risks &benefits of each choice. She is very friendly and cares about her patients, always prompt to answer your call.
My husband and I had been trying for baby since last 4 years but no luck. When we met Dr. Rashmi,  we knew that she is the one. She performed IUI procedure and I conceived in the first attempt. Now I am two months pregnant. Her knowledge and expertise in her field truly show through and have brought me so much comfort during this journey! We are very grateful to have Dr. Rashmi treating us, and we would highly recommend her to everyone having similar problems. Thank you for your help.
I consulted dr for PCOS she is friendly n listened to me patiently n even she took time to explain me about my problem n explained how tablet works n all.. I recommend Dr
